body: This system seems a bit rigged against this family tbh
Now that's a tradition I can get behind ! I'll tell you what, I'd even volunteer myself, for the sake of the village of course :3

They shouldn't keep the victims to a single family, unless the plan is to make the descendants have big tits.

Problem with that is the Habsburg issue. You don't want deformities to happen.
Like father, like son. I mean Like mother, like daughter.
